allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path src -Filter *.tsx -Recurse | Where-Object { \(Get-Content $_FullName -Raw\) -match ''createClientComponentClient'' } | ForEach-Object { $content = Get-Content $_FullName -Raw; $content = $content -replace ''@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs'',''@/utils/supabase/client''; $content = $content -replace ''createClientComponentClient'',''createClient''; Set-Content -Path $_FullName -Value $content -NoNewline }; Write-Output ''Archivos actualizados''")
